Question.Subject: Is formspring going to reveal?
Question.Content:
What should I do I they do? I wrote something on someone's to get revenge. If they reveal I am fucked.
What I'd the true story to this?
Question.ChosenAnswer: I read an article on the internet saying that it's all a joke, they aren't really going to be revealing anything. But at the end of the day you shouldn't be hiding behind anonymity... that's just stupid of you.

Answer.Content: I read an article on the internet saying that it's all a joke, they aren't really going to be revealing anything. But at the end of the day you shouldn't be hiding behind anonymity... that's just stupid of you.
